doc.after: The government backed Goethe Institut 77 named after the famous German author Johann Wolfgang von Goethe aims to enhance the knowledge of German culture and language within Europe and the rest of the world This is done by holding exhibitions and conferences with German related themes and providing training and guidance in the learning and use of the German language For example the Goethe Institut teaches the Goethe Zertifikat German language qualification
